storyInfo: Mudrock is uneasy about the situation, and Suzuran meets an old man who claims to be 'the last of the Winterwisp.' GreyThroat's clue doesn't seem to match up, and violence seems inevitable as tensions boil over.

attributes.content: We're going to let them use us for nothing?
attributes.name: Sarkaz Warrior

attributes.content: What's gonna happen if they really start calling themselves Reunion?
attributes.name: Sarkaz Warrior

attributes.content: They definitely will.
attributes.name: Mudrock

attributes.content: We'll be hunted down.
attributes.name: Mudrock

attributes.content: A town of this size can't do anything to us. But... What if it was an entire nomadic city?
attributes.name: Mudrock

attributes.content: If we took just one of the big Leithanien bankers, musicians, or aristocrats out of their fancy towers, we'd be set for life.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Warrior

attributes.content: Pride will ruin them.
attributes.name: Mudrock

attributes.content: It's the same pride that keeps Leithania's aggressive streak in check.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Warrior

attributes.content: We should avoid making trouble in Wolumonde. We will have nowhere else to go.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Warrior

attributes.content: We should not meet on the battlefield. This... this is no battlefield. Is it?
attributes.name: Mudrock

attributes.content: You, all of you, your time grows short.
attributes.name: Mudrock

attributes.content: Um...? Who are you talking to?
attributes.name: Sarkaz Warrior

attributes.content: No.
attributes.name: Mudrock

attributes.content: Just... musing.
attributes.name: Mudrock

attributes.content: Winter is coming. And we will have no choice.
attributes.name: Mudrock

attributes.content: Ugh... I've got a bad feeling about this.
attributes.name: Click

attributes.content: Now, any more questions?
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: Just to be sure, how did you identify the eight corpses, Officer Severin?
attributes.name: GreyThroat

attributes.content: Body type, sex, approximate age, a list of the town's missing persons.
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: But now is not the time to discuss the fire. We have more pressing issues at hand.
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: I don't disagree, but...
attributes.name: GreyThroat

attributes.content: What have you got?
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: The number of Infected people who lost their lives in the fire was 'four,' according to the Reunion member we spoke to.
attributes.name: GreyThroat

attributes.content: Is there a reason we should care what the enemy has to say?
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: With all due respect, this does matter. 'Caring' what he says is different from 'trusting' it. We have a major risk of misunderstanding here.
attributes.name: GreyThroat

attributes.content: I still don't think this will solve the problem. Uncovering the truth about the fire will not improve our situation.
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: It means a lot to me.
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: Then, with all due respect, Miss Folinic, you've been letting your emotions pull you around too much.
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: But you must—
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: I fight for Wolumonde and Wolumonde alone. That is my duty. I'm not here to serve the justice in your heart.
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: I have a responsibility to give the truth to Rhodes Island, not your thirst for revenge.
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: You—
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: —No, you're right...
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: I need to go calm down... I, I'll go help Lisa with the wounded.
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: Then it's settled. Our top priority is to retake Zwölftontechnik Strasse.
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: War is inevitable, at this point. Rhodes Island will need to focus on the fight for the automated Arts units, all while keeping a close eye on the Sarkaz and other partisans.
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: Direct crowd control will be on us. The most difficult jobs, we give to you.
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: Erm, did I say too much?
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: No. Tell me, what did you see in their eyes? The insurgents, and the angry townspeople.
attributes.name: GreyThroat

attributes.content: If they managed to overwhelm us, that would be the end of the town of Wolumonde.
attributes.name: GreyThroat

attributes.content: And regardless of what the truth may be, headlines around the world would read 'Reunion resurfaces and destroys a town in Leithania.'
attributes.name: GreyThroat

attributes.content: After so many sacrifices, so many goodbyes, I did not want to see it happen again.
attributes.name: GreyThroat

attributes.content: Ayerscarpe, contact Click. It's time to regroup.
attributes.name: GreyThroat

attributes.content: I'm going to check on the Infected captives.
attributes.name: GreyThroat

attributes.content: Schultz? I saw Miss Folinic already left. Is the meeting over?
attributes.name: Tatjana

attributes.content: Yes. Thank you.
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: They're getting loud out there.
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: They think they can destroy our homes and get away with it?!
attributes.name: Townsfolk

attributes.content: They trashed my shop, and beat my children!
attributes.name: Townsfolk

attributes.content: Those damned traitors! Ingrates! After all we gave them!
attributes.name: Townsfolk

attributes.content: We have to fight back!
attributes.name: Townsfolk

attributes.content: Fight back! Fight back! Fight back!
attributes.name: Townsfolk

attributes.content: Fight back! Fight back! Fight back!
Ugh. Look at them. Every one of them an avatar of justice.
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: Uncle, you really shouldn't smoke...
attributes.name: Tatjana

attributes.content: Doesn't matter.
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: Okay, all better!
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: That being said, you still have a mild infection. So don't go abusing Originium Arts!
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: Is that a joke? I'm a Leithanien. An educated Leithanien. How could I—
attributes.name: Infected Captive

attributes.content: No fighting!
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: No, it's not about fighting. Without Arts, I can't even use my refrigerator!
attributes.name: Infected Captive

attributes.content: You just use it normally, through the device. Don't irritate the Originium in your body. That way, you don't worsen your infection!
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: ...I cheaped out and bought a second-hand one that needs a caster to operate...
attributes.name: Infected Captive

attributes.content: No!
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: Y-you're an outsider! What do you know? Will I ever get to lead a normal life? With what we're fighting against, we—
attributes.name: Infected Captive

attributes.content: Okay, okay. Just remember to take care of yourself so you don't get worse. You're still pretty healthy. And no more using Arts!
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: We're fighting against... Never mind. What can I say to a child...?
attributes.name: Infected Captive

attributes.content: All right. Next up...
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: Oh, an old man? What's he doing here at his age...?
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: Heh heh. A nine-tailed Vulpo. That's something you don't see every day.
attributes.name: Old Man

attributes.content: Hm. That reminds me. I've been hearing a lot of talk of Winterwisps and outlanders. Would that be you?
attributes.name: Old Man

attributes.content: Oh, yes. Can you tell me where you're hurt?
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: Hm? Oh, I'm not hurt. I'm just here to wait for death. I'm old, and getting sleepy...
attributes.name: Old Man

attributes.content: D-death? Let's not get too morbid here...
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: Child, I'm a Winterwisp. Last of the Winterwisp clansmen, in fact.
attributes.name: Old Man

attributes.content: What?!
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: Heh heh. You're awfully cute when you're shocked, child... And, I sense no hostility from you.
attributes.name: Old Man

attributes.content: The last...? But everyone's been saying the Winterwisps are helping the Infected rebels.
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: *Sigh*. It's only when they're so filled with hate that they think of their heritage. And that heritage is just an excuse. They hate something else altogether.
attributes.name: Old Man

attributes.content: Would you indulge an old man for a minute? I'm already your prisoner, after all. I'm not going to do anything... ever again. I'm too old.
attributes.name: Old Man

attributes.content: Oh, um... As old as you are, I should treat you. Even if it's just a flesh wound.
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: Hah hah. I'm still pretty strong, in my old age... No, no. That's a lie.
attributes.name: Old Man

attributes.content: My clansmen mostly went elsewhere. Or they intermarried with the people of Wolumonde.
attributes.name: Old Man

attributes.content: In the end, how many real Winterwisps are left? Just a few of us old fogies.
attributes.name: Old Man

attributes.content: Sir... what did you do?
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: I... killed. Many people.
attributes.name: Old Man

attributes.content: A traveling merchant who came to Wolumonde, a noble who dared to wander into the wilds... and so many more.
attributes.name: Old Man

attributes.content: At first we thought it was justified. Proper vengeance...
attributes.name: Old Man

attributes.content: So the old-timers did all the hard work. The younger ones just stood by. None of it meant anything to their lives anymore.
attributes.name: Old Man

attributes.content: But vengeance. We couldn't kill the traitors. We couldn't kill the rotten nobles. It turns out, we could only unleash our hatred on so many innocents.
attributes.name: Old Man

attributes.content: We couldn't defeat Leithania. Not its laws, not the mighty roar of the engines of its nomadic cities.
attributes.name: Old Man

attributes.content: We started giving up. I escaped into Wolumonde, and Severin picked off the other old clansmen one by one. He's a hunter. Never wavers.
attributes.name: Old Man

attributes.content: But they say he'll sit with a dying enemy and have one last smoke with him. Too bad today's manufactured cigarettes are awful.
attributes.name: Old Man

attributes.content: As for me, I built myself a nest out of scavenged tin, underneath Wolumonde. Severin didn't get the last one, in the end.
attributes.name: Old Man

attributes.content: Am I afraid to die? Nay. Believe me, little Vulpo girl, I'm not afraid.
attributes.name: Old Man

attributes.content: I just want to hear the sound of a town's power plant roaring to life, after my own lifetime of fruitless revenge.
attributes.name: Old Man

attributes.content: Maybe someday Wolumonde will grow into a nomadic city, or maybe it'll die out.
attributes.name: Old Man

attributes.content: But... Hah... I'm a Winterwisp. Was I furious the first time I saw that boiler heat up and send the town crawling away? Yes, but what could I do? I remember it. I just cried.
attributes.name: Old Man

attributes.content: It surged, it scorched, it singed, unstoppable. What could I do with only my bow and a short sword? I fell in love with it... with this murder weapon...
attributes.name: Old Man

attributes.content: But Biederman did it, treacherous boy. A Catastrophe Messenger, and an outsider, did what I'd never dare to do in my entire life...
attributes.name: Old Man

attributes.content: S-slow down, sir! Th-that Biederman you're talking about...
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: I remember a Catastrophe Messenger in Leithania by that name, but I think he died in the fire?
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: Hm? I'm not sure about that. He's the one giving the orders.
attributes.name: Old Man

attributes.content: So that means...?
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: Do you know that feeling of powerlessness?
attributes.name: Old Man

attributes.content: Huh?
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: When I watched Biederman... take the Infected, the Arts, the destruction... When I watched him ruin the power plant, I was completely powerless...
attributes.name: Old Man

attributes.content: It turns out the thing that conquered us all those years ago was just a big hunk of iron... How weary I've become.
attributes.name: Old Man

attributes.content: ...Are you still there?
attributes.name: Old Man

attributes.content: Yes, I'm listening.
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: Don't rush to revenge. Don't fight. Listen to me, girl.
attributes.name: Old Man

attributes.content: The Winterwisps aren't the reason for all this... At least, not anymore.
attributes.name: Old Man

attributes.content: How many here in Wolumonde have the Winterwisp blood in their veins? We were the ones who built this place in the beginning.
attributes.name: Old Man

attributes.content: Winterwisp, Winterwisp is Wolumonde... It's the moon... And they, they destroyed themselves...
attributes.name: Old Man

attributes.content: So that's the story.
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: Look, little Vulpo girl, do you see where the road leads?
attributes.name: Old Man

attributes.content: Up ahead? It's an ordinary road. It leads to the town hall.
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: No...
attributes.name: Old Man

attributes.content: It leads to the mountains.
attributes.name: Old Man

attributes.content: The long banner flies... twelve twists and turns in the trail... travelers and blowing snow... ah... the power plant...
attributes.name: Old Man

attributes.content: Right. I forgot.
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: That is the way to the mountains.
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: Good night.
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: Did you hear that, Folinic?
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: We've been going in circles.
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: A Catastrophe Messenger thought dead is actually leading the mob?
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: Biederman, huh...?
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: Mmm——♪ Mmmhmm——♪
Such a brittle little branch♪
Winterwisp, oh, Winterwisp♪
Weary of a long life, weary of a long death♪
Sing out your song, firm and strong~♪
Singing through summer~♪
And on through winter~♪
Winterwisp, oh, Winterwisp~♪
